product_name: Ibex Indie Full-Zip Bike Jersey - Men's - 2011 Closeout
long_description: Whether it's weekday commuting or weekend training, the lightweight Ibex Indie Full-Zip bike jersey is a piece that can be worn in warmer weather on all your bike rides. Made of soft, nonirritating 18.5-micron merino wool, this top insulates, wicks away moisture and resists odors-naturally! Full-zip front with locking pull lets you adjust for ventilation. Three back pockets hold you energy gels and snacks; reflective logo on the back. Semiffited cut; machine washable. Wool meets Zque(TM) standards, ensuring environmental, social and economic sustainability, as well as animal welfare and traceability back to the source. Closeout.
short_description: Whether it's weekday commuting or weekend training, the lightweight Ibex Indie Full-Zip bike jersey is a piece that can be worn in warmer weather on all your bike rides.
